inn1.comm: some swing straightaway, appeal for lbw, landed on leg stump and was moving further down, Parthiv tried to clip that fine, missed but it kissed the pads on the way to the fine-leg boundary. Replays show it pitched mostly outside leg and would have clipped leg, only just.
short of a good length outside off, moving away just a hint, leaves it alone
lands on a good length on middle and leg, moves back to turn it into the leg side wide of square leg for a single
turned away off the back foot ot the right of fine leg, dives full length to make it back just in time despite an accurate throw from the deep
nipping away after landing on a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and opens the face slightly to guide it behind point for a single
fullish on the off stump, Parthiv gets forward and defends it towards extra cover
ooh, bangs it hard outside off and it nips away just a hint, a threatening deviation that, just beat the outside edge as Rahane poked at it
goodish length on the off, gets a stride out and defends it confidently towards cover
back of a length outside off, nipping away as well, drops his hands on that one
down the leg side, Rahane doesn't bother chasing, called a wide by the umpire
a touch too wide on the off side this time, landed wide and moved away further
angling in towards middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg for a couple more runs
full on leg stump, tries to work it into the leg side, misses, appeal for lbw, would have probably gone down as he missed it while attempting the flick
good length a touch outside off, gets forward and dabs that towards cover
Parthiv comes forward and across to defend solidly to extra cover
a touch short of a good length from Bresnan, and Parthiv tucks him behind square for one
Bresnan gets some work on the new ball, shaping it away from Rahane, who raises his arms high tp leave
a probing delivery from Bresnan, nipping away off the pitch once more, but it's well played by Rahane, who softens his wrists and plays it down through gully
slapped on the up past a diving backward point fielder. India's fans in the ground liked that shot
rising off a length outside off. Parthiv over-hits it a touch straight into the ground, and the ball ends up going nowhere
a splice-jarring length from Finn keeps Rahane pinned back in his crease
fuller, and a touch wider from the gangly fast bowler. Rahane lets it go outside off
Finn thunders to the crease, knees pumping high, and hits the deck hard, the ball nipping off the seam and stinging Rahane's thigh
good running, Parthiv dropping the ball down close with a defensive shot and the batsmen setting off
Finn is bowling with vim and vigour. Again he hits the seam, the ball buzzing in past Rahane's bat to hit him on the thigh
too much for Rahane. Too quick, and the extra bounce and seam movement means bat beats ball once again
at the other end, Parthiv is happier facing Bresnan, who hits a good length on off stump and is defended to cover
fuller from Bresnan, not much width but Parthiv still found room for a drive to extra cover
Bell at backward point saves a couple of runs as the left-handed Parthiv hops onto one leg to cut
great line! It looked like the cross-seamed delivery from Bresnan, and it really got big on Parthiv as he propped half forward at it. Past the outside edge
sliced in the air through gully! There's no-one there though, and Parthiv is quite safe as he slashes on the up
full and straight. Rahane turns it off the pads to midwicket
great wheels from Finn, another bristling length delivery is kept out by Parthiv. Finn has really come on as a bowler this summer
a little fuller, but still offering nothing for the drive as Parthiv stands at the crease to defend to cover
Finn continues to nudge 90mph as this one is sent down fuller still, and is driven to mid-off
right up to the bat this time, and dug out off the toe end to cover
beaten on the outside edge! Parthiv shuffles at the crease but moves neither forward nor back, and there's plenty of daylight between bat and ball
and again! Finn zones in on the perfect line to the left-handed Parthiv, who is left poking and prodding outside off
full and straight, Rahane nudging to wide mid-on
metronomic stuff from Bresnan, but Rahane is well forward with bat and pad together to keep it out
Rahane continues to sit in defence, defending another length delivery
nudged just wide of point, but nowhere near the middle and there's no run to be had
a touch too straight from Bresnan, and Rahane finally finds the single down to fine leg
it's in the air ... and safe! Parthiv aimed a wild swipe at a full delivery aimed at middle and off, slicing across it but getting enough on the ball to beat the off-side field
this could be Finn's quickest ball of the day so far. It's full and straight, Rahane cracking it back down the pitch before Finn gets a palm to it in his follow-through
ah, Rahane might have made more of this were he in a more attacking mood. A low full toss is sent down but just a single is the result, the ball being flicked down to fine leg
chopped through gully and down to third man for one

dropped by Samit Patel at third man! Rahane gave himself room and sliced at the ball, scooping it high towards third man where Patel ran round and set himself to take a regulation chance ... but spilt it and let it through his legs
and now an appeal for lbw. But it's turned down, and rightly so. The ball had seemed in sharply to strike Rahane on the thigh, and would've sailed well over leg stump
Finn is full to end the over, Rahane stretching forward and tapping a drive just wide of mid-off for one
rare lapse from Bresnan, but he's not punished as Rahane's cut is stopped at point by Bell
not this time! Bresnan is short and wide once again and this time Rahane takes full toll, the ball pinging out of the middle of a cut and racing away
straighter from Bresnan, and Rahane hops back to defend to leg
another full-ish, straight length delivery is pushed softly back towards the bowler
after a poor start to the over Bresnan has come back well, a third delivery is fired at the top of off to draw a defensive stroke from Rahane
another boundary! Rahane lifts the ball to long leg with a scoop-flick. Several fielders set off after it, but none can get there in time, and that over has ruined Bresnan's figures a touch
clipped in the air but wide of any fielders in the leg side. It's not timed quite well enough to find the boundary, but they push hard for a third run
Finn stays full to the right-hander, who nudges to the man at midwicket
a Finn lifter outside off is prodded to point
that is a snorter of a delivery! Again Finn finds disconcerting bounce outside off at good pace. Rahane fishes at it, but the edge is beaten

edged! And four! As in the last match, Finn is finding no reward for some very probing bowling. Rahane was totally squared up by one that left him off the pitch, the ball almost taking the leading edge but flying through third slip and down to the boundary
Finn targets the yorker to finish but isn't quite on target, the ball glanced to fine leg

great start! Dernbach seams his first delivery sharply back in, beating Rahane on the inside edge and rapping him on the front pad. The appeal is turned down as the ball rolls to third man ... Close shout
again he hits the pad, but this time the ball goes to leg to allow a single
Parthiv presses forward and opens the face of the bat to get a length delivery down to third man
nudged into space by Rahane, another sharp single the result
good running by these two, Parthiv tapping it away for one more
deceived by the slower ball! Well Dernbach didn't wait long to use his favourite weapon, and Rahane didn't really read it at all. He was through his leg-side push before the ball even got to him
well, Parthiv had an almighty swipe at this outside off, similar to the shots I play in park cricket. Similar result too, as the ball trickled down to third man
good intent from Rahane, charging the tall fast bowler. The execution isn't quite there, however, as the ball takes a thick inside edge and cannons off the pad
the movement in to the right-hander means the ball takes the inside edge again - this time off a drive - and rolls into the leg side
Finn loses his radar, spearing one down leg. He's very displeased at his own effort, and gives himself a good ticking off as he marches back to his mark
that's better. Bang on target and Rahane defends
turned wristily into the leg side, but straight to the fielder
and just a single to finish what has been another reasonably tight over from the bowler

gone! Dernbach strikes. Rahane attempted a mow to leg, but the ball - quite possibly another slower one - took the top edge and looped down to third man, where Finn sprinted across to his left and took a great diving catch
nudged away in defence after the wicket
tapped into the off side

Parthiv looks for that pick-up pull that he plays so well on occasion, but the length wasn't quite right and he didn't come close to putting this away. In fact, the inside edge bounced just past the stumps!
turned off the hip and down to fine leg
on a length and straight, Dravid presses half forward to defend right under the eyes in his own inimitable style
and why not, as he fizzes another one past the outside edge of Parthiv's bat
a touch straighter. There's bat on ball this time, and Parthiv finds a single near midwicket
meanwhile, Dravid walks into another defensive push
pace and bounce from Finn, and Dravid is a little hurried as he tucks defensively to leg
left alone outside off
another good over from Finn, who keeps things tight with his final delivery, Dravid unable to score
Parthiv waits in his crease for a slightly slower length delivery - one of Dernbach's many variations no doubt - and guides it to third man
Dravid turns the wrists over a full one and finds a single at midwicket despite the efforts of the fielder there
Parthiv looks to break free! He dances down the track at Dernbach and swings with gusto, but hits only fresh air
just short of a good length, but Parthiv is content to defend off the back foot
slower one! This time Parthiv was looking for the pull to midwicket, but he's undone by the lack of pace
slow yet again. This time it is picked, Parthiv paddling through square leg
looped down on middle and off, and a bottom-edged cut rolls to cover

a first-over wicket for Swann! It's been a while since he managed that. Parthiv was trying to take advantage of the attacking field, but got underneath an attempted chip down the ground, getting much more height than distance. Bresnan ran back from mid-on and made no mistake. Odd innings from Parthiv. He switched between cautious defence and all-out attack without much success.
sharp spin for Swann as Dravid backed away, but it's kept out
turned into the leg side for a single
Kohli lunges well forward to smother his first delivery
tapped back to the bowler, who dives to his right to cut it off
Dernbach continues his economical work, Dravid staying deep in the crease to defend
a little fuller this time, but it's aimed right at off stump and again Dravid opts for defence
punched, on the up, to cover. Straight to the fielder
runs! The gap at cover is miniscule, but Dravid has threaded it to perfection with a backfoot drive. It didn't appear as though he had timed it, but the ball beat the fielder to the boundary
and he follows that up with a dinked single
slashed down to third man, and Kohli is off the mark
flat and fizzing from Swann, Kohli steps back and pushes to mid-on
tossed up a little more outside off, and this time mid-off is pinged

timing! Kohli must have very powerful wrists. He flicked this with the spin, his wrists springing into action, and picked the gap between midwicket and mid-on. A couple of England fielders set off after it, but the ball found its way to the rope
tapped into the leg side again, no runs this time
eased down to long-on
Kieswetter gets very excited as Dravid backs away and misses a cut at an arm-ball that rushed straight on, but there was nothing on that
did this keep a little low? Kohli played it as if it did, bending right down to the ground after a slapped drive went to point
Kohli flashes outside off to get the ball down to third man

shot! Tremendous stroke from Dravid. He's signing out in style. This was a cut, on the walk and with the weight going forward. The ball screamed out of the middle of the bat, backward point didn't even move
a similar stroke from Dravid, but this time the ball takes the bottom half of the bat and goes to third man. Are we seeing evidence of inconsistent bounce?
Dernbach hones in on the top of off, Kohli defends
this one tails in to the right-hander a touch through the air, and was a little straight to start with. Kohli nudges to midwicket for one
flighted, worked away to midwicket
tossed up outside off, driven hard past extra cover
pushed down the ground for a single
closes the face and turns it towards square leg
slapped off the back foot down to long-on
fires it hard down the leg side, closes the face and works it down delicately past short fine leg to clinch a boundary, nicely done
gets forward and drives that wide of midwicket
slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches it hard towards extra cover
taps it wide of point this time for a single
tossed it up outside off, drives it wide of cover for a single into the deep
gets on the back foot to work it towards midwicket off the back foot
rocks back to that short one and punches it past deep extra cover for a couple more, Bairstow runs across and cuts it off
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flights it outside off, drops it down into the off side
gets across and turns it down towards midwicket
gets forward and to the pitch, pushes it down the ground
floats it outside off, reaches forward and drives it into the deep past midwicket for a single
quicker through the air, played it down to midwicket once more
plays the paddle does Dravid, fetches it from middle and off and plays it fine for a couple of runs
floats it on the off stump, pushes it down to long-off
short on middle, whipped to deep midwicket for a single
quicker through the air, short outside off, turning away, moves away and cuts it to deep point for a single
straightish on middle, pushed towards extra cover
slower this time, on middle and off, gets back and dabs it into the off side for a single
flighted and he picked his spot, rocked forward, got to the pitch and drove it elegantly past extra cover for a couple of runs
takes it from the off and tickles it towards short fine leg
short outside off, moves back and slaps it to deep cover for a single
slightly quicker, drops it in front of point and calls for a single, is rightly sent back
short outside off, waits for it to turn in and punches it to extra cover on the bounce
a little wider this time, plays it wide of point for an easy single
bowled it short on middle, punched back to the bowler
turned away off the front foot past midwicket for a single
fullish on the off, driven with a full face to long-off
full on middle this time, dug out towards midwicket
on middle and leg, plays it along the ground to long-on
shortish on middle, pushed wide of Patel who covers good ground to his left to stop that
fullish on the off stump, gets across and plays it to midwicket
classic Dravid, waited for it to turn in and punched it gracefully wide of deep extra cover, two more, 50-stand
flicks it a little awkwardly from outside off to short fine leg
short outside off, punched away off the back foot towards deep cover for one more
slightly short on the off, nudged into the leg side, racing through these overs are these two spinners

good running, got back onto the back foot and turned it gently into the leg side, plenty of open spaces behind square leg and they've scrambled through to two as it takes deep square leg to cover plenty of ground to get to it
shortish outside off, there was a hint of movement, just nipped away and Dravid went for the cut but missed
shortish on middle, whipped to deep square leg for a single
angling in towards middle, pushed down the ground to long-on
quicker outside off, caressed towards deep cover for one more
eased through extra cover into the deep on the off side, a slip-up in the field and they've come back for the second, Dernbach the man in the deep
pushed down the ground to long-on for one more
tickled down to short fine leg for a single
fullish on middle, driven wide of midwicket
gets it past the diving midwicket this time, gets across and plays it wristily
good consolidation here, one more past midwicket
comes down the track to that flattish delivery and turns it into the leg side
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
fullish, driven hard back to the bowler
comes down the track to drive it into the off side but gets a thick inside edge
a bit of width and Kohli cashes in, bends low and thwacks it past the diving extra cover to beat the man in the deep
they've got a cover fielder on the circle now and he strikes it straight to him
nudged into the off side for a single
short and wide and it's slapped hard by Dravid, Bairstow runs across, slips and cuts it off, two more
angling in towards middle and leg, tries to work it square, gets an inside edge onto the pads
short and wide, cut away hard towards point
low full toss, flicked away towards deep square leg for one more

good length outside off, Kohli opens the face and guides it down to third man, Swann slips in the deep and limps towards the ball after misfielding, was struggling there was the offspinner. He's hobbled off the field now
short of a good length on the off, defended into the off side on the back foot
pushed through the off-side field inside the circle for an easy single
slower one bowled short outside off, run down to third man for a single
that took forever to get to the batsman, slower one, went for a mightly pull but missed, and so did the keeper
shortish outside off, chopped it behind point for a single
good length on the off, crunches it back to the bowler
a touch too straight, clipped it nicely past square leg for a couple of runs
wide spaces between third man and deep point and he guides it nicely into that gap for two more
short on middle, pulls it down to long leg for a single, kept it down all the way
waits for it to come onto him and works it down to midwicket
nicely done Virat, short ball on middle, swiveled and helped it on its way to fine-leg boundary
pitched up and he'll feel he missed out there, drove it well but straight to extra cover
plays it towards square leg for a single to keep strike
gets a thick inside edge as he tries to dab it behind square on the off side
gets forward and taps it back past the bowler to raise his half-century, huge cheers from the Indian contingent, a workmanlike innings for the most part
cut away down to third man for one more
pushes it past Dravid but midwicket runs across and prevents the single
mid-off is up in the circle, pushes it firmly but not very, a single on offer and he takes it
two more in the deep as he rocks back to punch it past extra cover, the innings progressing nicely here
pushed off the front foot to extra cover
he likes that inside-out shot, was aiming at extra cover but got it towards long-off, just the one
played down the ground to long-on for a single
the inside-out drive works fine this time, comes down the track and cracks it hard but it seemed extra cover got a hand to it, two more
slaps it down past the bowler to long-on for a single
comes down the track and eases it down to long-off for one more to keep strike
shortish outside off, tries to cut, gets a thick inside edge, Kohli calls for a quick single and makes it in time
Improvisation, good length and he chips it over the bowler, towards long-off for a couple more, though there isn't a long-off since mid-off is up, long-on had to cut it off
that's another favourite shot of his, full on the off and he whips it stylishly over midwicket for a boundary
shortish, a mistimed pull but has enough on it to give them three more, got it well wide of long-on and deep midwicket
eased through the off side past cover for a single
nicely timed by Kohli, full on the off and he just jabs it uppishly past the bowler to beat the diving mid-off, what a productive over
Dravid moves back to punch that through the leg side, gets an inside edge onto his pads, just the single
driven down towards long-on for a single
full toss on middle and leg, pushes it down to long-on to raise a half-century in his final ODI, he's signing off on a high
Kohli's stepping up more, comes down the track and chops it into the vacant space behind extra cover, two more
played down towards long-off for a single
shortish on the off, moves back and cuts it into the deep for a single
dropped, Dravid was trying to drive it past the bowler, didn't time it well at all, Dernbach reacted a little late moving to his left, made a good effort nevertheless but couldn't hold on
shortish outside off, slapped to deep cover for a single
well done by Kohli, got a bit of width there and he opened the face to guide it past the diving point for two more in the deep
slower one bowled outside off, turned it past square leg
two more for Dravid, pitched up and he cleared extra cover to make long-off run across
slower one bowled on the leg side, gets it wide of Bresnan who slips, not the first time we've seen an Englishman crash onto the ground today, that allows them to take the second
steps out and plays that down to long-off for one more
comes down the track and tried to go downtown with that but couldn't quite get hold
saw him come down and held it back a bit, punched back to the bowler
the inside-out drive again but straight to extra cover
slower through the air, has to reach for it after getting out of the crease, a single to long-off
turned away square on the leg side for a single to keep strike
good length on the off, makes a bit of room and plays it hard straight to extra cover
smacked hard down the ground to long-on for a single, trying to attack here
drags it from outside off to play it past midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
punched uppishly this time towards Swann at long-off, on the bounce, just the single
almost in the blockhole on middle, dug out back to the bowler
Dravid's turn to hit a boundary, made a bit of room and got the width he wanted, just chipped it firmly over extra cover to find the gap and the ropes, 200 up
Kohli's going for it, stepped out of the crease and Patel chased him but he had eyed his spot and executed the shot superbly, over midwicket
and again, a bit more effort in that one, got to the pitch and swung it hard between deep midwicket and long-on
played to midwicket but can't get it past him
comes down the track and inside-out over extra cover for two more, into the 90s now
shortish on leg stump, turning towards off, dabbed it into the off side

massive, that was supremely struck, Patel's out of the attack now I reckon, pushed it quicker through the air but Kohli had made up his mind, landed on a length and he lofted it high and hard over long-off for a six
shortish outside off, Dravid makes room to cut, chops it close to the stumps, Kohli wants the single and makes it easily
back of a length on the off, pushed past cover into the deep for a single
short outside off, makes room to cut that over point, misses
a mistimed pull by Dravid, was aiming at midwicket but got it to long-on
drops it down in front of point for a single
beautifully done by Dravid, mid-off was inside the circle, Finn bowled it slightly short outside off, Dravid made a bit of room and punched it imperiously in that gap between mid-off and extra cover
Kohli moves to 99 with a push to long-on
goes for the sweep, trying to fetch it from outside off, misses, gets a leg-bye
floats it on the off stump, gets across and plays it to midwicket
driven past Swann, who dives full length to his right to save the single
full outside off, gets across and tickles it towards square leg for a single to raise an excellent century, his sixth in ODIs and an emotional reaction from Kohli, relief writ large on his face

Dravid's gone! Came down the track and tried to fetch it from outside off to swing it over midwicket, missed, the ball turned and clipped off stump. Applause all around as an illustrious career in ODIs has just ended. The England players walk up to Dravid and shake hands in a gesture of appreciation, and the crowd applaud him all the way to the pavilion
pushed back to the bowler
worked away past square leg and there's enough time to run back for the second
shortish on middle, tries to whip it square again, gets a thin inside edge onto the thigh, Raina runs through for a single
gets on the back foot to turn it wide of square leg for a single

banged in short on middle and Kohli went for the pull but couldn't connect, Finn appeals but the umpire doesn't think it's out. They've asked for a referral. Did it go off the glove? Hot Spot didn't capture anything, the side angle doesn't show any contact with the glove. The front angle gave us the impression that there might have been some contact with the glove but the side-angle put that impression to rest. Not out.

dropped, should go down as one even though Ian Bell didn't get a hand to it, he ran in too far, length ball and Kohli was targeting the long-on boundary, connected but not as well as he would have liked and Bell ran in too far and it went over his head, and landed inside the ropes
pushes it on middle from round the wicket, plays it back to the bowler
slightly short on leg stump, punched past midwicket for a single

Hit-wicket, Kohli's gone, he rocked on the back foot to work that square and rocks back far enough to dislodge the bail on middle and leg stump, that's gone, Kieswetter spotted that and appealed and Kohli has to go after a delightful innings
pushed it full on the off stump, driven straight to extra cover
gets across and defends it into the leg side
gets across, closes the face and drops it into the leg side for a single
short on the off and Dhoni pulls it, not quite a complete one, but over midwicket for three more runs
Raina deposits that over the bowler's head, a bit of width and he went for it, smashed back and it curved in the air
low full toss, pushed down to long-off for a single
full outside off, tries to drill it past cover, mistimes but there's a single on offer
bowls it full outside off, digs it wide of cover for a single
almost in the blockhole, dug out back to the bowler
yorker length outside off, tries to dig it out, can't make contact
another yorker, Raina had begun walking across as Dernbach was running in, digs it out back to the bowler
good over this, the slower one this time and Raina didn't pick it, tried to open the face but it was a late reaction
low full toss and he pushes it back to Dhoni who tries to evade it but is struck on the shoulder, just the single
slower one, the legcutter, turned into the leg side for a single
length ball, Raina drags that wide of midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
the whiplash is out but didn't time it as well as he would have liked, mid-off was inside the circle so it worked fine for him, had enough on it to fetch him four
full toss and he smacks that past midwicket into the deep for two runs
full toss again, this time outside off stump, makes room and crunches it over point for a boundary
doles out a length ball and Dhoni takes full toll, swings it powerfully over the deep midwicket boundary
good response, a yorker on middle, digs it out back to the bowler
low full toss, doesn't quite get hold of it, just the single this time to deep midwicket
Dhoni's cashing in on these length deliveries here, in the slot outside off and he drives it well over mid-off but it slowed up in the outfield, three more
full on the off, driven down to long-on for a single
the legcutter, bowled it slightly short on the off stump, defended into the off side
full on the off, smashed it wide of Trott at long-off for a couple of runs
slower legcutter and he found the gap, had to reach for it but cut it well enough to beat point to the boundary
slower one bowled full on leg stump, tries to sweep it square leg, misses an it pops up towards short fine leg, just a leg bye
full on middle, looking to swing it past square leg, just the single as he doesn't hit it well enough
third man is up, pushed it full outside off, tried to steer it wide of third man but Trott dived full length to his left to keep them to a single
short on middle, looked to pull it square, Dhoni ran for it and almost collided with the bowler, Finn isn't happy about it
good length delivery outside off and Raina tried to launch that over long-on, missed

similar delivery and Raina attempts an identical shot, it's closer to the off stump this time and he makes contact but ended up miscuing it, was a skier and Bresnan at extra cover didn't flinch, took a well-judged catch
short and wide and Dhoni slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge to the third-man boundary
Jadeja times it a little too well, was bowled on a length on the pads and he clips it straight to deep midwicket where Bopara takes a good, running catch
slower one, but a touch too wide, Dhoni leaves it be
full and wide, stretches to reach it and slices it over point for four more, intelligently done
wide again, actually not, did it land just inside that line there? Doctrove thinks so, Dhoni let it go
Patel's dropped it, slower one again and Dhoni tries to to wristily work it around, gets a top edge and Patel at square leg has to run back, doesn't hold on and Dernbach isn't amused
Dernbach and Patel won't make a happy couple back in the dressing room, he pulls it mightily over midwicket for a flat six, this is their highest score of this tour
wide this time, just outside the line and it's given
Dernbach's done it once more, Dhoni lets it go. Wided again
yorker length, digs it outside off for a single to raise his half-century, one of two this innings to go with Kohli's ton

inn2.comm: pushed him back with that short of a good length delivery, Cook rocked back to play it wide of square leg, nipped back in a bit
goodish length outside off, moving away and Kieswetter leaves it alone
short of a good length on middle, defended from the crease towards midwicket
nicely done, slightly short on leg stump and Kieswetter turns it down really fine to beat fine leg to the ropes
pushed it fuller on the off stump, a hint of away movement, Kieswetter tried to push it through the line, got a thick outside edge to point
nicely timed, too straight from Vinay, pushed away sweetly between midwicket and mid-on for a couple, in fact three
poor start by RP, a full delivery on the pads, swinging in and Kieswetter accepts the gift, clipping it away past short fine leg for four more
shortish on middle, keeps a little low and he plays it down to short midwicket
short of a good length on the off, nips back in and he defends it solidly
Bad start for RP, full and wide, in the slot for Kieswetter and he lunges forward to caress that through cover and point
appeal for lbw, looked really close, nipped back in from middle and struck the back pad as he tried to defend that off the back foot, would have been going high says Hawk-eye
slightly short on middle, is solidly behind this one, defending it back to the bowler
slightly short on the off, played out into the off side back towards the bowler
there is a short point in place, short and wide and it's struck fiercely towards Raina at short point, he gets a hand to it and takes a lot of pace off it to keep them to just one
another gift for Kieswetter, meaty delivery on the pads and it's driven elegantly through midwicket for an easy boundary
moves across to work that shortish delivery into the leg side, misses and is struck on the thigh, would have gone over again
gets across and dabs it in front of mid-on to complete a quick single
short of a good length, punched straight to Raina at cover
shortish on middle, getting it to dart back in, defended solidly towards mid-on
slightly short outside off, eased it past cover for a single
beaten, in the channel outside off with a bit of away movement, Cook was tempted into playing the drive but was almost done in by the movement
plenty of room for Cook this time and on a length, gets forward and cracks it between cover and point for a boundary
short of a good length outside off, a touch too close to cut, Cook was looking to chop it into the off side but got an inside edge just past the stumps
better this time, slightly short on middle, moving away and he presses it to point

Kieswetter's livid, Vinay's ecstatic, kept a little low, landed on middle and leg and Kieswetter moved well across to work that square leg and missed, early indications are that it would have gone on to hit leg but we need another replay to confirm. The umpire Nigel Llong, however, had no doubt and raised his finger immediately
a good bouncer from Vinay, banged in short outside off and trott sways out of the way
shortish on the off, defended towards point from the crease
stands tall to that shortish delivery and punches it towards extra cover
in the channel outside off, guides it down to third man for a single
back of a length outside off, punched towards extra cover from the crease
RP angles that in towards Cook, bowls it a little full, Cook pushes it firmly to mid-off
slides that one on the pads and Cook will feel he missed out, was targeting square leg but couldn't make contact and was struck on the pads
short outside off, slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge towards third man for a single
full outside off, there is a slip in place for Trott but it goes past him, drawing him into playing a drive and he pushes hard at it but gets a thick edge to beat third man to the boundary
much closer to the stumps this time, Trott moves across and defends him towards point
slightly short on the off, punched towards point from the crease
short of a good length on the off, punched from the crease to mid-off
gets across does Cook and whips that past a diving midwicket, just the single as the fielder got a hand to that one
stylishly done by Trott, drove that hard on the up but Raina at short extra cover saves a boundary, diving to his right and palming the ball towards mid-off
short outside off, cut towards point but there's a misfield this time that allows them a single
short outside off, trying to test him there after placing those two midwickets, not very short, pullable but Trott opts out of it
good length on the off, pushed it firmly off the front foot to extra cover
width, pitched up and he mistimes a drive, gets it past a diving point, just the single
easily done, knocks it down into the off side and races through for a single
lucky, is Cook, tries to drive that through the line after it landed on a good length, it nipped in and almost bowled him through the gate, got an inside edge to the fine-leg boundary
short ball, cut hard into the ground but it can't beat Raina at point
appeal for lbw, Cook moved well towards off stump there, tried to flick it fine, was probably struck outside the line
pitched full on the off, digs it out wide of mid-off for a single to keep strike
perhaps a little short of a good length, but Cook doesn't look to do to much, tapping to midwicket
there's the shot! Again too short from Munaf, this time Cook seizes on it to hammer a pull out to the man at deep midwicket

smashed down the ground! That's the first six of Trott's ODI career, and a good way to get it too. He skipped down at a slower ball, picking it and sending it arcing high over Munaf's head with a full swing of the blade
nudged off a length to midwicket ... they look for the single but the fielder is across too quickly
Munaf sticks to a fairly disciplined line after the boundary, Trott manoeuvring the ball into the off side this time
Trott finds a single to long leg with that trademark clip off the hip of his
full from Vinay, Trott comes forward and threads a drive through cover for one
Vinay is bang on target to start, aiming for the top of off. Cook defends back down the track
Cook appears to have realised very quickly that he can't afford to play himself in again, he's got to find fluency quickly. To that end, he gives himself some room second ball, but can't get it away!

that's been put away! Again Cook looked to open up the off side, this time the ball was a little fuller and skidded in to the bat off the surface. He threaded the gap at cover, and the sweeper had no chance
Vinay pulls his length back to negate the drive, and Cook's clip goes to midwicket
Vinay is a little too straight to finish, and is neatly worked into the wide space on the leg side for a single
shovelled into the leg side by Cook, who loses his shape whenever he tries to be too aggressive. Still, he gets enough on it for the single
great yorker! Munaf trundles in and fires one down at Trott's toes. He gets the bat down in time though, and there's a scampered single to be had
off the hip, and they run another as the ball rolls to leg

Trott is caught off a no-ball! He jumped down the track and tried to drive Munaf over the top, but couldn't get it past Parthiv at mid-off. Parthiv launched into frantic celebrations, flinging the ball high into the night sky, but Munaf has over-stepped! Well, India have no luck. It's official
the Free Hit is sliced into the covers, and they take a single
slashed up ... but dropping safe at short third man! There was a fielder nearby but he couldn't get back in time
full on off, and Trott picks up another run with a drive off the front foot, the ball skidding into the outfield
eased down the ground for one to start
good running, they push hard for the second as Cook clumps Ashwin out into the deep
there is some spin on offer for Ashwin, but it's slow off the surface and Cook has plenty of time to rock back and cut through cover point
full on off stump, driven down to long off
almost done in the flight! This was nicely looped up by Ashwin, and Cook very nearly drove over the top of it. He managed to jab down in time, however, and keep it out
and Ashwin follows that up with a much quicker, flatter one, that rushes straight on and is whipped to midwicket
clobbered! It was a slower one from Munaf - the legcutter - but Cook saw it early, cleared the left leg a little, and heaved it to wide long on

Munaf follows that up with a long, wide half-volley that is driven hard along the ground, but stopped by the sweeper. And there's the 50 partnership, at a-run-ball. Unlikely pair to bat in that fashion, you might think. But there you go
another slower cutter from Munaf, but it allows Cook some width and he cuts well behind square
pushed, on the up, into the off side, and they take a single
a really-well directed slower-ball yorker from Munaf, and it slips under the bat wide of off
another slower one, this one isn't quite on target however and is driven down the ground
looped up really slow by Ashwin, from round the wicket. Cook bends into a flashing square drive
nicely flighted once more by the offspinner. Trott plays with the spin to midwicket, finding the fielder directly
there's the variation, a quicker arm ball that rushes straight on. Trott was deep in his crease waiting for it, and aims a deft little late cut to third man
driven away once more, another single
Cook is well forward and drives hard through the covers ... Raina is out in the deep but they take on his arm, and are easily back for the second
bottom edge! Cook went down on bended knee to sweep but the ball kept low, taking the bottom edge and cannoning off his thigh
not quite the yorker, but it's very full and nicely straight and Trott can only drive back to the bowler. Some of the spectators get excited as Munaf catches the ball, but it was clearly a bump ball
right up to the bat once more. Trott tried to put him through straight mid-on, but Munaf stretched his right hand out to stop this one too
this time he does find a single, driving into the off side
full and wide, a shovelled drive finds long-off
slapped on the up and just behind square, the ball being stopped at backward point
this time he gets him away, but again it's just the single

misfield at midwicket! Trott came down the track and flicked to leg, but the fielder couldn't stop it cleanly. It was Raina, so it's safe to assume the wet conditions had something to do with that. Indeed, the ball landed on one of the wet practice wickets and skidded past him
good use of the feet by Cook, skipping down to take it on the full and easing the ball to long on
Trott steps right back in his crease to nudge the ball with the spin into the leg side
ah, the 'pause-and-deliver' ball from Ashwin! Cook had come down the track again and had to pause himself, before driving out to the cover sweeper
and now the carrom ball from Ashwin, but the variation doesn't matter as Trott is well forwarded and smothers the ball to fine leg with a sweep
punched down the ground for one
Cook looks to attack straight away, charging out of his crease, but clips it to midwicket

in the air ... and safe! Cook sliced right across this one, the ball went high but down the ground, landing right between long on and long off. And, in fact, it looks like we've got an injury here. Munaf was the man running from long off, and as he slid across the painted outfield he's hurt something. It's his right ankle, and he looks to be in some pain. Yep, the stretcher comes out. Kind of sums up India's tour ... I'm not sure what the delay is now, but this is taking forever. Munaf is just sitting on the outfield. There are now two stretchers near him ... And after all that, he's helped off with a stretcher!
Jadeja comes round the wicket, and is flicked to midwicket by Cook
Jadeja does well to field off his own bowling, zipping across quickly to stop Trott's drive
Trott uses his feet once more, but Jadeja holds this one back and he can't quite get to it to drive
poor ball, good shot! Jadeja fired one down short and wide, Trott stepped back and cut it hard. Importantly, he found perfect placement behind square to find the boundary
speared down on the pads, but Cook can't get it away
lobbed down without much spite or pace, and Cook charges out, drving to extra cover. Why is Dhoni not up to the stumps?
shot! Cook goes to fifty with a reverse sweep off the medium-pacer, taking the ball on the full and putting it past the fielder at short third man
dropped Dravid has dropped a sitter at short fine leg. Cook went for the orthodox paddle sweep but didn't connect very well, the ball looped straight to Dravid, but popped out of his hands!

gone this time! Kohli celebrates with an excited yelp and some fist-pumping as Cook gives himself room and aims an ungainly heave to leg, only to miss the ball completely and have his stumps re-arranged. Dravid runs straight to Kohli to congratulate him! And well he might, that's Kohli's first ODI wicket
quicker and just short of a good length to start. Bell stays deep in his crease to defend
there's acres of room out on the leg side, and Trott stays back to whip the ball out in that direction
tossed up a little higher and a little fuller by Jadeja, Bell stepping to it to drive to long on
Trott is forward now, driving hard out to long off
good delivery from Jadeja, who delivers from round the wicket and gives Bell no width to work with, the ball driven to extra cover
slick stuff once more from Jadeja, who spotted Bell coming down the track and adjusted accordingly to keep him quiet

close! Jadeja is quite electric in the field, and this will be tight for Trott. The ball had been tapped towards deep mid on and Jadeja himself set after it, hurling it back to Raina at the non-striker's end ... But replays show the batsman was just home
Kohli continues, and Trott nurdles a slow legcutter out to midwicket
great shot for just the single. Bell bent his front knee and sent the ball flying down to long off with a flowing drive
chopped down behind square on the off side
Kohli sprints in and aims for the top of off, Bell tapping it back down the track
a low, dipping full toss is driven down to long-off
hacked across the line, the ball dribbling to square leg
driven down the ground for a single
six runs! Bell jumps out at Jadeja and is utterly free-flowing as he lifts the ball high over long on
and he follows that by hammering him down the ground. Jadeja stuck a hand out but that was a real stinger
a second ODI six for Trott! It's another good one, the batsman making room and mowing it straight down the ground
good batting. Jadeja really fired this next one in flat and fast, but Trott just waited and tapped it away for one
another one! Bell collects the third six over the over, and it's another massive hit down the ground. England have stormed ahead on D/L now
good pressure on the fielder, and the batsmen are back for a second run. The ball had been flashed out into the deep on the off side, but the return throw was underarm and weak
very full and aimed right at middle, Trott stepping forward to drive through mid-off
close to leg stump! Bell shuffled right across to off stump, looking to target fine leg, and Kohli sent down a length delivery that jumped just over the stumps
nudged away for a single
there's the fifty for Trott! He taps it away for a quiet single on the off side, and England now need 99 to win from 73 balls
a very slow cutter from Jadeja, Bell really having to wait for it, but a single is the result as the ball is turned to midwicket
he floats one down on a length to start, and Bell swivels back to pull through square leg. Bell probably tried to hit that too hard, and ended up with a pretty weak connection
arrowed down the leg side by RP this time, a clear wide
slanting across the right-hander on a good length. Trott stays deep in the crease and drops the ball in front of point for a single
sliced down to third man! Bell had come down the track at RP, flashing hard at the ball
full and on the toes, Trott nudges to leg but there's a man inside the circle to stop the single
pulled up and over midwicket! Much too short from RP at his pace, and Trott had plenty of time to rock back and hammer the pull out into the deep, the ball bouncing a few times before cross the rope
short and wide on the off side this time. Trott cuts hard but this time there is cover for the shot
Bell sets himself outside off as Kohli delivers, looking for the cheeky paddle to fine leg, but the ball is not there to be hit and he wears a top edge on the body
nurdled to leg for one
Bell steps out to drive but finds extra cover
and again, Bell uses his feet but his drive is intercepted in the covers. Why is Dhoni not up to the stumps I ask you?
shot. Bell bends down low and squirts a square drive out through point, hard running brings them three
heaved out into the leg side, two more runs to the total

gone! Bell perishes, caught by the substitite Tiwary at long-off trying to clear the boundary. That's just what India needed. England are still ahead on D/L - by five runs - but India have snapped what was becoming a very cumbersome partnership for them.
full, straight, and driven down to long on for a single
Trott drives on the up, opening the face of the bat, but finds the man at gully
RP attacks the base of the stumps but Trott is in a good position to dig the ball out into the leg side for one
and Bopara does well to follow suit, rotating the strike
RP continues to keep it full, but that allows Trott to drive down to long off for one
good start from him, Jadeja finding grip and spin off the surface from round the wicket to keep Trott quiet
more spin, but this time the delivery is a little too short and Trott is able to step back and flick to leg
fired full and at the pads, Bopara steps forward, leans over the ball, and finds a single at straight midwicket

there goes another one! Trott had set himself well outside leg before Jadeja even delivered, and seemed to think he had been given the length and width he was looking for. He couldn't control the cut, however, and the ball looped easily to the man at point
young Bairstow begins his international career with minimum fuss, easing down to long on for one
driven down the ground, another single to the total
tapped away quietly for one
Bairstow does the right thing by finding another single. Kohli had offered up a relatively quick length delivery, but Bairstown picked up a tip-and-run single to cover
good running, pushing the fielder hard. Bopara came forward and drive wide of long on, allowing just enough space for a single
Bopara charges out to take the ball on the full-toss and drive to long-off

sharp running! Bairstow nudged to leg but there was a man there, who immediately swooped. They had committed to the run, and ultimately he was safely home. Not the greatest return to the non-striker's end
good ball! Kohli sends down a pinpoint yorker, and Bopara does well just to keep it out
definite spin for Jadeja! He came round the wicket to Bairstow, and squared up the batsman with turn and bounce
that's a response! Bairstow, cool as ice, has smoked this into the night sky. Huge six, the ball flying out of the middle of a slog sweep
Bairstow stays back and punches into the leg side, they push hard for the second
Bairstow has put England ahead on D/L with another superb shot! After the slog sweep, he unfurls a neat reverse sweep that has the beating of the man at short fine leg
how have they got two here? Bairstow nudged it softly into the leg side. The ball went into something of a gap but didn't leave the inner circle, somehow they're back for the second
clipped off the toes for another single
it's a slower ball to start, but Bairstow only looks for a single to the man on the edge of the circle on the off side
another slower one from Vinay, but it's been sliced to the third man boundary! Bopara was originally taken in by the change of pace but recovered well, and found some fortuitous placement
quicker this time, and it's chopped off the top of middle stump for a single
another slower length delivery - very nearly the slower bouncer - but it's pulled into the leg side
very full, Bopara makes room and absolutely drills it down to long off. This was really slow. The slower slow one

Bairstow! This 21-year-old batsman, on debut, has just smoked another slower ball out of the ground and into the River Taff. It was a back-of-the-hand delivery but he just picked it up so cleanly over long on
inside edged! Bopara walked out at an RP full toss, getting a thin inside edge on it. The bal went straight back, however, and was easily stopped by Dhoni
hacked into the leg side, just the single
intelligent bowling from RP! Bairstow had stepped well away to leg and the bowler fired down a yorker wide of off stump on the other side, the ball slipping under the bat
first real mis-hit from Bairstow. It was a full toss and there to be hit, but the ball connected high on the bat and lobbed into space at midwicket

a top edge flies for six! Bopara walked into a premeditated paddle with the field set as it is, the ball slipped out as a full toss and he couldn't control the shot, but got enough on it to get it over the short boundary

four more! Again Bopara utilises the paddle to fine leg, this time hitting the ball along the ground and past the fielder inside the circle. RP offers the batsman a few choice words, but it's a bit pointless as the batsman has easily come out on top in this encounter

that's out of the ground again! Bairstow is a fierce hitter of a cricket ball. This was full and straight and Bairstow - who has shades of Kevin O'Brien (and I don't just mean his hair colour) - just scythed through the line. The ball simply disappeared into the night sky, never to be seen again. Out comes the fourth umpire with a box of balls!
drilled down the ground, and they're back for the second
nudged away for a quiet single to follow that up
England are cruising now. Bopara lifts a leg-stump half-volley over wide midwicket ... and just over the fielder there! Four runs
nudged off the toes for a single
tapped into space on the leg side, and again, how is this two runs?
a scooped chip rolls out to wide long on
Ashwin's white flannel falls out of the top of his trousers as he bowls, but Bopara isn't distracted, cutting the arm ball out to deep point
two more to the total, more really good running as the ball is simply driven into the leg side
carrom ball from Ashwin, but Bairstow appears to pick it, playing back and defending to leg
swept down to long leg
driven to long on, and England now need just three runs to win
short and hooked by Bopara, the ball flies down to long leg but drops short of the fielder
there it is, a low full toss is clipped easily away, and England win
